00021     public class viewMessage : System.Web.UI.Page
00022     {
00023         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label senderLabel;
00024         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label dateLabel;
00025         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label messageLabel;
00026         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink ReturnHyperLink;
00027         protected System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label subjectLabel;
00028   
00029         private void Page_Load(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00030         {
00031             // Put user code to initialize the page here
00032             DBDriver myDB=new DBDriver();
00033             string mID=Request.QueryString["id"];
00034             myDB.Query="select u.userName sender, m.subject subject, m.timestamp date, m.body body from users u, messages m where m.ID=@mID and u.ID=m.senderID;";
00035             myDB.addParam("@mID", mID);
00036 
00037             MySqlDataReader dr=myDB.createReader();
00038             dr.Read();
00039 
00040             this.subjectLabel.Text=Convert.ToString(dr["subject"]);
00041             this.senderLabel.Text=Convert.ToString(dr["sender"]);
00042             this.dateLabel.Text=Convert.ToString(dr["date"]);
00043             this.messageLabel.Text=Convert.ToString(dr["body"]);
00044             myDB.close();
00045         }
00046

00049         {
00050             //
00051             // CODEGEN: This call is required by the ASP.NET Web Form Designer.
00052             //
00053             InitializeComponent();

00055         }
